L

Language - Enum in at.peirleitner.core.util.user
This class represents a language that can be selected by a User.
This does not differ between multiple language choices (ex.: EN_US and EN_GB will both be named EN).

More languages will be added once a good percentage of files have been translated into it on crowdin.
LanguageManager - Class in at.peirleitner.core.manager
Manager for message handling.
Messages registered via #registerNewMessage(String, String) will be placed in the default language file #getFile(Language) with the default language being LanguageManager.getDefaultLanguage().

Drastic changes have been made in v1.0.5, not all methods may be available before that.
LanguageManager() - Constructor for class at.peirleitner.core.manager.LanguageManager
